Research Interests

Research

  • Transportation Engineering
  • Relations between transport, planning and the environment
  • Smart cities
  • Intelligent transportation systems

Fields of Interest

  • Analysis of travel behavior
  • Integrated urban mobility (MaaS)
  • Transport and climate change
  • Discrete choice models & stated preference surveys
  • Interaction of AI and decision theories
  • Econometric and statistical modeling

Courses

  • Transportation simulation
  • MATSim
  • Discrete choice models & stated preference surveys
  • Interaction of AI and decision theories
  • Econometric and statistical modeling

News & Updates

Stay current with our lab's latest achievements, publications, and events.

New Publication on MaaS

Oct 15, 2024: Prof. Wang's latest paper on "Behavioral Barriers to MaaS Adoption" has been published in Transportation Research Part A.

Lab Awarded NSERC Grant

Sep 01, 2024: Our lab received a NSERC Discovery Grant to support AI traffic research.

Welcome New PhD Students

Aug 20, 2024: We welcome Elena Rodriguez and Jin Chen to the lab!
